author: Lon.TV
description:
Watch Tyler's recap: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1jIyLPsVfv4 Tyler the @AntennaMan and I went to Washington DC to meet with the FCC about ATSC 3.0 / NextgenTV and DRM encryption. In this video I'll recreate the presentation that I made to the FCC. Tyler will do his part of the presentation in his video. See more on this topic: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=50EdKdKb1XQ&list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:28 - What's the Process?
02:42 - FCC Presentation Begins: DRM the Root Cause
03:18 - ATSC 1.0 Much Easier for Device Makers
06:07 - Majority of Installed Smart TV OS's Not Compatible
07:07 - ATSC 3.0 / NextGenTV at Retail
09:23 - ATSC 3.0 Without DRM Works on Most Devices
11:03 - DRM More than a Gateway Problem
11:17 - DRM More than a Gateway Problem
12:27 - What's Next?
13:33 - Tyler's Video:

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists! 
Weekly Breakdown of Posted Videos:  - https://lon.tv/ema
title: The FCC Met with Tyler the @AntennaMan and Me About NextgenTV DRM! Here's what we told them.
